message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Considering its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly lower than what I had in mind.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?  This would be a fair deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
